title: Started my journey
description: Started studing webdevelopment at Kodehode where I quickly discovered a passion for programming

title: Introduction to web-development
description: We've been studying basic html and css for this first part of the course and I've made huge strides in understanding the languages and its concepts

title: Javascript
description: I've advanced past the basics and will now finally start working with js to create more responsive and useful projects
list: Started working on challenges from frontendmentor.io
First draft of portfolio is coming along nicely

title: Front-end development
description: With more basic knowledge I've moved on to working with frameworks and creating more complex websites
list: I've started working with node and react

title: React vs NextJS
description: By now I'm mostly working in React, but I'm looking forward to the next step where we'll work with NextJS and typescript. While it does seem a bit daunting it's also really exciting
list: I'm looking into recreating my portfolio in NextJS
Successfully completed Calculator app challenge from frontendmentor

title: Back-end developer, a turning point
description: We've had to decide on our future path as developers here at Kodehode and I've made the choice to focus on back-end development. While I do wish to become a full-stack developer, I feel the focus offered in this path will lead me to become a better programmer in the future
list: Version 1.0 of my portifolio is now live, and you're looking at it!
I've started working with a lot more interesting projects that demand a lot more knowledge, and I'm loving it!
Created my first server in node, also got the chance to work with express
